description: Updates the attributes of an existing relay resource.

parameters.name: Authentication
parameters.description: Authentication for the relay destination server--specify the secretARN where the SMTP credentials are stored. NoAuthentication (dict) --- Keep an empty structure if the relay destination server does not require SMTP credential authentication. SecretArn (string) --- The ARN of the secret created in secrets manager where the relay server's SMTP credentials are stored.

nested_params.name: NoAuthentication
nested_params.description: Keep an empty structure if the relay destination server does not require SMTP credential authentication.

nested_params.name: SecretArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the secret created in secrets manager where the relay server's SMTP credentials are stored.
